title: Implicit Behavioral Cues for Enhancing Trust and Comfort in Robot Social Navigation
abstract: This work explores implicit behavioral cues in robot navigation systems to enhance human trust and comfort in social navigation scenarios. We present a framework that integrates subtle behavioral signals to improve human-robot interaction in dynamic environments.

title: Toward Fair and Efficient Congestion Control: Machine Learning Aided Congestion Control (MLACC)
abstract: This paper presents MLACC, a machine learning-aided congestion control system that addresses fairness and efficiency challenges in network traffic management. Our approach uses deep learning models to predict bandwidth requirements and optimize congestion control algorithms.

title: OpenData: A Framework to Train and Deploy ML Solutions in Wide-Area Networks
abstract: OpenData provides a comprehensive framework for training and deploying machine learning solutions across wide-area networks. The framework addresses data acquisition, model training, and deployment challenges in distributed network environments.
